text: 6.16: Hos 10.8; Ru 23.30; VB 4.2; 4.10; 9.6Mbe zomzorgip, mba mbɨkshɨɨ gum ŋkɨɨr kamɨv khaŋ mbe suanga, “Nde rɨv, nzan tɨ rɨv, nza vhagiri. Mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨga perigi guman rɨmani nɨman nza ndi zorgɨrim, mba Sipsiva Ŋguk zɨv won ndav shirɨr bakɨmen nzan nɨɨŋv, muumbara mbatɨgar nzan muuŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
